commands.name: !ping
commands.description: Test ping to verify bot response. Usage: !ping

commands.name: !help
commands.description: List all available commands and their descriptions. Usage: !help

commands.name: !builds
commands.description: List all ship build links. Usage: !builds

commands.name: !saveBuild
commands.description: Saves a build. Use a comma to separate the title and the link (don't use a comma in the title). Usage: !saveBuild Title of the Build, http://link.to.build

commands.name: !saveGuide
commands.description: Saves a guide. Use a comma to separate the title and the link (don't use a comma in the title). Usage: !saveGuide Title of the Guide, http://link.to.guide

commands.name: !deleteBuild
commands.description: Removes a build with the provided name (case sensitive).  Usage: !deleteBuild Title of the Build

commands.name: !deleteGuide
commands.description: Removes a guide with the provided name (case sensitive).  Usage: !deleteGuide Title of the Guide
